矱字的基本解释

矱
yuē
尺度。

矱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuē］
［《集韻》鬱縛切，入藥，影。］
(1)尺度；法度。
(2)指以之为法度；模拟。

矱字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【矢字部】　矱； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页825第27
【集韻】【韻會】?鬱縛切，音雘。與彠同。度也。【屈原·離騷】求榘矱之所同。【後漢·崔駰傳】協準矱之貞度。【註】準，繩也。矱，尺也。

矱字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
矱字的起名意思

暂无。

ruler

ruler

scale.
ruler
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [yuē]
["Ji Yun" Yu is bound to cut, used as medicine, and shadow. ]
(1) Scale; degree.
(2) Refers to using it as the law; simulation.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Vector Characters] 　矱; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 825 27
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Depressed bound cut, sound 雘. Same as 彠. Degree also. [Qu Yuan·Lisao] Seek the same thing as Zhu Qi. [Later Han·Cui Qi Biography] The virginity of Xie Zhunyan. [Note] Accurate, the rope is also.矱, ruler also.
